brief.content-text:
Diagram 4, Activity

The diagram depicts an activity in which you must choose the host(s) that will receive a packet, given the following destination addresses. A small LAN has one switch, Switch 1. Switch 1 has five hosts attached: H1 through H5.

A. 192.168.100.2
B. 192.168.100.255
C. 237.192.126.17

H1 Source Host
H2 192.168.100.1, 225.5.77.126 group
H3 192.168.100.2, 237.192.126.17 group
H4 192.168.100.3, no group address
H5 192.168.100.4, 237.192.126.17 group
H6 192.168.100.5, 225.5.77.126 group
